OUTLINE : Patients undergo fractionate external beam radiotherapy , 3-D conformal radiotherapy , intensity-modulated radiotherapy . Patients receive oral pioglitazone hydrochloride daily 1 week prior brain irradiation , continue 6 month completion radiation radiotherapy . After completion study treatment , patient follow periodically .
